title: Scarlett Johansson Battles Disney for Black Widow Profits
description:
After finally getting her own solo movie for “Black Widow,” Scarlett Johannson has a few bones to pick with Disney over their simultaneous release of the movie in theaters and on Disney+.  Tune in to hear about what claims Scarlett brought and where things stand now!

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/legallyjudgy
